title: Textile, 1851–63
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller and block printed
description: White cotton decorated with fancy broad stripe in grey, with design (incomplete) of flower clusters in circular foliage framed and white foliage. Center wide srtipe of flowers in shades of brown, borders at each side of brown flower clusters and fancy edge. Ground effect probably by molette.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1851–63.Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller and block printed. 1967-10-44.
